questions.question_text: In the Cortex XDR console, from which two pages are you able to manually perform the agent upgrade action? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Agents upgraded can be performed from Endpoint Management and the Action Center. Asset management does not support this function and Agent installations is to wrap up the installation package to deploy the Agent.

questions.question_text: Which version of python is used in live terminal?

choices.C: Python 2 and 3 with standard Python libraries
choices.A: Python 3 with specific XDR Python libraries developed by Palo Alto Networks
choices.D: Python 2 and 3 with specific XDR Python libraries developed by Palo Alto Networks

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The Answer is B.
https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XDR/Cortex-XDR-Pro-Administrator-Guide/Initiate-a-Live-Terminal-Session#:~:text=The%20Python%20command%20interpreter%20uses%20Unix%20command%20syntax%20and%20supports%20Python%203%20with%20standard%20Python%20libraries

Selected Answer: B
the answer is B

Selected Answer: B
I agree with link below

questions.question_text: Under which conditions is Local Analysis evoked to evaluate a file before the file is allowed to run?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/content/dam/pan/en_US/assets/pdf/datasheets/education/pcdra-study-guide.pdf

Local analysis is enabled by default in a Malware Security profile. Because local analysis always returns a verdict for an unknown file, if you enable the Cortex XDR agent to Block files with an unknownverdict, the agent only blocks unknown files if a local analysis error occurs or local analysis is disabled. To change the default settings (not recommended), see Add a New Malware Security Profile.

choices.C: The endpoint is disconnected or the verdict from WildFire is of a type grayware.
choices.A: The endpoint is disconnected or the verdict from WildFire is of a type malware.
choices.D: The endpoint is disconnected or the verdict from WildFire is of a type benign.
choices.B: The endpoint is disconnected or the verdict from WildFire is of a type unknown.
